string.text: Barkeep do you know a good mechanic for repairs?

I do not do this type of work. But in the kitchen I have a stalker that works for grub. He is good with weapon technology. So if something appeals to me, and I will give him a job. Something you want to fixed? \n\n Prices for repair are:
Sorry that's way too much, maybe another time when you are desperate for work.
Wow! Your repair guy is awesome, tell him thanks!
He sure can! \n\n Prices for repairs are:

Sometimes, when I have enough parts. I like to study things and to tinker with technology. But I have too few tools so repairs are just my hobby. So I think it will not come cheap. \n\n List of repairs:
I think I can fix your weapon for a little money.
Please repair my weapon. See why the bolt jams.
Patch up my armor. Otherwise I will be walking around naked.\n\n
%c[255,255,128,1]Buggers! I think I left some money in a sock. Well I'll go look for it.
Wait a minute ... I think I have all the parts.
Now let us check your armor. There is some damage... and... more damage here, here and here. Well that should do it. It's done!
Excellent! It won't be necessary to look for a replacement.
Well despite all of these patches the repairs looks like new. Keep a few rubles for beer!
I think I can help you, this screw should be replaced. What else do you want done?
Sorry to bother you, I was thinking that you might be able to fix something. So how much will it cost?
He he he ... but do not worry, you will not leave without your pants. Prices here are divine. So what do you want fixed? \n\n My rates:
Repair my gun, it fails when using.
Take care of my gun. I've been warned of some Burer that soon will visit.
Armor is all screwed up. It has yet to be fixed?
Damn, I have a hole in my pocket, and all my money is gone. I'll have to back track and hopefully find my money.
I replaced some parts and polished with a cloth, so here you go and be careful with this toy!
Well, you're a fucking joker ... well at least the armor is properly patched, and the rest I do not care about.
Of course I can, but do not forget to pay, I do not work on credit. \n\n My rates:
Repair relations with the duty of:
Don't you have relationships with other groups?
Who you think I am? You are just a tad nosey!
Dolgovtsev is hunting for my head, can't you get along with them?
I want to join Duty, will you help?
Svobodov pursued me everywhere, help settle a relationship with him?
Stalkers are hunting for me, help me!

Okay, but these services are not cheap. The more you have problems with the groups, the more will it cost to restore a relationship with them. 
 So, I'll now check your status ... 
 Done. 
 Are you sure about what you want to do?
Wait, now I'll send them a message. \n\n Here is their answer. Now everything is in order.
Yes, I want to restore relations with Duty.
Yes, to restore relations with Freedom.
I want to be free, long live Freedom!
Yes, I want to restore relations with the stalkers.
I have heard the call of the Monolith. Can I identify them?
Yes, I want to join the Monolith!
I've heard that the military announced they need some new members, and I do not want to miss this opportunity!
Beats me, perhaps go to the bandits.
I have spoken twice, I will not repeat. Understand?
I can no longer live like this, I want to be a loner!
Can you advise on how to join the Mercenaries?
Yes, I want to be a Mercenary.
Can you assist with an introduction to the Ecologists?
Yes, I want to be an Ecologist.

Ugly yellow-white dwarf lives in dungeons, does not like to appear in the light. Arrange the trap stalkers, scientists and military. Overlaps with the outputs of various large debris, rubble and beams. It dwarfs are very powerful hand, they may tear their prey, strong intellect and high response. Dwarfs are at war with blind dogs. The character dwarfs are extremely nasty, panicky anger causes them to make wild and unexpected things. Their character with intelligence makes them one of the most dangerous opponents in the zone. They have highly developed premonition and telekinetic abilities. Premonition helps to feel the enemy, and to assume its location. Telekinesis allows you to manipulate objects on a large enough distance to throw them at the enemy or to conduct reconnaissance.

Burer hand acquired a number of properties, the most useful of which is a strong resistance to radiation. The details of this mechanism are uncertain. You can contribute to science by selling hand byurera scientists for research.

The result of genetic experiments on the program 'Universal animal advocate.' A very clever and cunning creature, hiding, goes from the back, in a move reminiscent of a panther. Duplicate system of internal organs and the brain makes an additional process of killing is very problematic. The only worthy opponents in the Zone - dogs and psevdogigant.

Whether the result of the experiments, or feedback on the remaining areas of people. In the kinks limb hypertrophy, a person close to human. Heather. Slouches and hides under his pseudo-cloak. From a distance, like the humpback stroller. Trying to lure stalkers conversation or request. At a time when the stalker turns his back, straightens and attacks hypertrophied limb. If you share a meal, you can find interesting information about the Zone. The break is eating rats, dogs, flesh. With some likely to pursue the player.

Cats are not only adapted to the radiation in the Zone, but also gained some useful skills. Radiation is almost did not change their appearance. Individually weak, but encountering a pack better put a bullet in the forehead. Otherwise be worse ..
Properties zombie hands are bing investigated. You can make a contribution to science, having sold it to scientists for research.
Chimera foot skin has a very high tensile strength that they want to artificially replicate in military outfits. Very expensive trophy.
Very appreciated the increased crystal eyes after which the mutation in this individual has acquired a number of interesting properties.
Bought up by scientists to study. Due to the fact that the population-candy huge and strong enough threat they pose not valued very highly and the weight decent.
Absolutely tasty brain psevdogigant prized for its medical properties. You just need to cook and eat it.
Biological generator of electric fields. Fully understood, but still continues to buy podeshevke.
Strong mutated cat wool, like dogs, to the chemical and electrical effects have long attracted the attention of scientists. Many labs are struggling with the mystery of the wool.
The indispensable Cluster of Energy thing.

This weapon is one of 5 weapons were found in 'Dead City'. The place was full of garbage and radiation. Metal will be highly radioactive, and any ammo that gets in contact with a weapon will also radioactive. This weapon is not for rookies, use this weapon, you have at least one artifact slow radiation. Shooting 
 Ammunition: 
 12x70, a piece of metal 
 12x76, dart 
 12x76.

This weapon is one of 5 weapons were found in 'Dead City', the place was full of garbage and radiation, the metal will be highly radioactive, and any ammo that gets in contact with this weapon will also radioactive. This weapon is not for rookies, use this weapon, you have at least one artifact slow radiation. 
 Ammunition:

 armor-piercing 5.56x45 millimeter ap.

This weapon is not for rookies, use this weapon, you have at least one artifact slow radiation.

This weapon is not for rookies, use this weapon, you have at least one artifact slow radiation.

This weapon is not for rookies, use this weapon, you have at least one artifact slow radiation.

A highly modified version of MP5, was found in a stash Cabrobro's. One of the best weapons in the type of gun submachine, there is more light than the orignal and is perfect for use as a 'pistol'. 
 Ammunition: 
 standard 9x18 mm FMJ, 
 improved 9x18 millimeter pmm.

Gold MP5, a real beast, it is made of real gold so it is accurate and reliable, however, and he is very heavy. 
 Ammunition: 
 standard 9x19 mm all-metal, 
 improved 9x19 mm PB1c, 
 standard 9x8 mm all-metal, 
 improved 9x18 mm PMM.

The principle of Gauss gun is based on the electromagnetic acceleration of bodies with magnetic properties. This model uses an unusual concept - not accelerate the bullet itself, as in other modern samples Gauss weapons, as an anchor, which pushes the bullet. In this way possible not only to improve military specification (since the anchor is made of special materials), but also to move the nonmagnetic bullet. On a normal lead shot.

The principle of Gauss-auto pistol based on the electromagnetic acceleration of bodies with magnetic properties. This model uses an unusual concept - not accelerate the bullet itself, as in other modern samples Gauss weapons, as an anchor, which pushes the bullet. In this way possible not only to improve military specification (since the anchor is made of special materials), but also to move the nonmagnetic bullet. And the rate of increase.

Improved version of the Gauss weapons, created by scientists Zone. It is more optimal power consumption, resulting in virtually no recoil, but slowly recharged as it requires more time to stabilize energy. \n Ammunition: 2-mm Gauss ammo.

A modified version of the rifle LR 300, with increased effective range of up to 1000 meters and more deadly, even if the screw on a silencer. This is the best sniper rifle in the Zone in all respects. 
 Ammunition: 
 standard 5.56x45 mm SS109, 
 standard 5.45x39 mm, 
 5.56x45 mm armor-BP, 
 penetrating 5.45x39 mm AP.
The energy cell to recharge the Super Gauss rifle. The energy source is taken in part from the artifact Vspyshkat.

A good automatic. High Tech with a large magazine and high accuracy, especially good with 9 mm armor-piercing ammunition. 
 Ammunition: 
 standard 9x19 mm armor-piercing, 
 9x19 mm PB1c improved.

Automatic pistol, standing on army has around the world. It is also popular among criminals because of their excellent combat performance. 
 Ammunition: 
 standard 9x19 mm armor-piercing, 
 improved 9x19 mm PBS.
Set of a thousand knives for throwing.
This is a special artifact that had once been an ordinary piece of metal, but in consequence of the impact of emissions acquired deadly new properties. Throw distance of 10 meters.

According to rumors, he belonged to the Brazilian stalker with a strange name 'artifact.s' who visited Chernobyl and begged Wishmaster perfect protective suit. Among stalkers are legends about the speed of movement in that suit. Where did the owner is not known, but the suit was found near the Sarcophagus. The suit material is made of high-strength materials unknown to science. Monolith believe believe that it is made of the finest artifacts zone. It is equipped with a night vision device and protect you from any nepriyatnosti.Tkan impregnated with colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore allows to carry 231 kg more than the found and increases the rate of escape from dangerous areas.

Scientists have tried to copy protection suit 'Lightning', but they came out only a rough kopiya.Tkan impregnated colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore can carry 210 kg more weight and increases the rate of escape from dangerous areas. It has fewer features, is heavier and has a different color.

Light protective suit equipped with a gas mask stalker. Produced gunsmiths group Liberty. It consists of a military body armor with Kevlar plates vrezannymm. Can protect the weak damage. The structure of the costume is covered with a special compound that enhances protection against anomalies.

Light protective suit equipped with a gas mask stalker. Produced gunsmiths group Liberty. It consists of a military body armor with Kevlar plates vrezannymm. Can protect the weak damage. The structure of the costume is covered with a special compound that enhances protection against anomaliy.Tkan impregnated colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore can carry 147 pounds more on alcohol and corned beef and increases the rate of escape from the warehouses.

Created once one of Kiev defense technology research center has been put on the production group debt. Similar to the standard model of the protective suit CCL-9 with a gas mask, but is made of stronger materials. Provides good protection against various types of damage.
Scientific binoculars. Zumm 10x. Built-in detector Recognition of hostile elements. Equipped with a sound sensor. It is extremely necessary thing in the Zone.
Stalker suit with a gas mask. The effective combination of light body armor and military rubber suit with reinforced Kevlar plates provides effective protection against firearms.

Stalker suit with a gas mask. The effective combination of light body armor and military rubber suit with reinforced Kevlar plates provides effective protection against fire oruzhiya.Tkan impregnated colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore can carry a 42 kg found more cargo and increases the rate of escape from dangerous areas.
Slightly improved thin vest, equipped with gas masks. Slightly increases the protection against bullets.
The prototype military exoskeleton to carry additional loads. This second generation exoskeleton. Provides excellent protection from bullets. Has little protection from anomalies.

Modified stalker suit from Mercenaries, has built a gas mask. Outfit design was the foundation of costumes used by special forces of the Western armies. Has a little more improved security features than a military body armor CCL-7.

Modified stalker suit from Mercenaries, has built a gas mask. Outfit design was the foundation of costumes used by special forces of the Western armies. Has a little more improved security features than a military body armor CCL-7. The fabric is impregnated colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore can carry more than 84 kg of stolen goods, and increases the rate of escape from predsledovateley.
The usual thin vest, one of many. Gives little protection from weak poverzhdeny. Does not protect against anomalies and artifacts.
The usual thin vest, one of many. Gives little protection from weak poverzhdeny. Does not protect against anomalies and artifacts.

Modified stalker suit with a gas mask, manufactured by gunsmiths group Liberty. It is made of high strength military body armor tserkoniumnyh interspersed with elements that give good protection against bullets at medium to long range. The suit material consists of two layers: the bulletproof and covered with asbestos. Provides good protection from radiation and weak manifestations anmaly.
Leather jacket bandits interspersed reinforced Kevlar. Provides bandits comfortable existence in the zone.
Traditional jacket Bandit jacket consists of a leather jacket with Kevlar protection. This model is equipped with gas masks.
Bandit Kevlar jacket with a mask 'Natural'

Traditional jacket Bandit jacket consists of a leather jacket with Kevlar protection. This model is equipped with gas masks. The fabric is impregnated colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore can carry a 63 kg more vodka and loot and increases the rate of escape from predsledovateley.

Stalkersky suit the grouping Monolith has built-in protection system of anomalies. His defensive capabilities is slightly worse than that of the military body armor CCL-9A. Characteristics similar to those of the majority of costumes neutral stalkers, who combine the qualities of body armor and anti-radiation suits. Very good protection from bullets.

Stalkersky suit the grouping Monolith has built-in protection system of anomalies. His defensive capabilities is slightly worse than that of the military body armor CCL-9A. Characteristics similar to those of the majority of costumes neutral stalkers, who combine the qualities of body armor and anti-radiation suits. Very good protection from bullets. The fabric is impregnated colloidal mass of artifacts and therefore can carry 168 kg more weapons and increases the speed of the curious.

The first prototype military exoskeleton, which was never put into production because of the high cost of materials. This first generation exoskeleton. This version has only the basic functions of its series, such as increased mobility and good protection from all types of damage.

Very rare costume, existing in a single copy in the zone. The former owner of the costume - a cunning stalker who stole the costume from the lab x18. This is the first prototype Nanozaschitnogo costume, based on a suit CCL-9D. Has a unique protective ability from all types of damage and has the ability to heal its owner.

Traditional clothing bandit - leather jacket with sewn-armor elements. Provides protection, it is insufficient in harsh areas. 
 Protection: 
 Burn: 10 %
 Electric Shock: 10 %
 Impact: 10 %
 Rupture: 15 %
 Radiation: 0 %
 Chemical Burn: 10 %
 Explosion: 10 %
 Bulletproof Cap: 15%
Regular army outfit. The set includes a knitted mask. Ineffective against abnormal and other effects.
Dark Cloak of the 'dark' veterans. Protection against abnormal effects is insufficient, but the bullets saves. In the cloak of protection Mail web.
Brown cloak 'light' veterans. Protection against abnormal impact of efforts, but the bullet makes the medium. In the cloak sewn extra pockets.
Camouflaged sniper cloak. Protection against abnormal effects is insufficient. Extra pockets.

Spetsnaz suit of armor is based on well-proven in Zone SKAT-9M, especially for special forces commanders. The basis: a heavy suit of armor army series ZSHB-13P helmet and built-in compensation scam-13P. Provides excellent protection from the bullet and shrapnel hits, it does not reduce the mobility of the soldier. In the presence of a balanced system of protection against abnormal exposure. Protection against telepathic influence.

Produced by one of the defense of Kiev Institute of custom groups 'Debt.' The simplicity and reliability of the base model CCL-9, combined with new material provides good protection against a variety of harmful effects, including gunshot injuries. Because of the lack of respiratory protective body armor needs some work. 
 Protection: 
 Burn: 50 %
 Electric Shock: 50 %
 Impact: 50 %
 Rupture: 50 %
 Radiation: 50 %
 Chemical Burn: 50 %
 Explosion: 40 %
 Bulletproof Cap: 40%

Coverall masked neutral stalker. For based samples SWAT gear Western armies. Due to the special fabric treatment enhanced the stability of armor in the physical displacement of the plates. According to the characteristics of the protective body armor is slightly larger than the army CCL-7 series.

Due to the special fabric treatment enhanced the stability of armor in the physical displacement of the plates. According to the characteristics of the protective body armor is slightly larger than the army CCL-7 series.

According to the structure resembles a widespread among neutral stalkers overalls, which is connected to the body armor suit Radiation Protection. Good protection against small arms weak. Protection against abnormal activity is poor due to lack of air filtration systems.

Normal thick padded jacket with knitted mask any lot. Slightly increases protivopulevuyu and fragmentation protection. Ineffective against abnormal and other effects.

Produced by artisans group 'Freedom' light stalker suit with knitted mask. Easy military body armor and overhead reinforcing Kevlar plates. Able to protect the weak from the weapon. The fabric is treated with a special compound jumpsuit, which increases resistance to abnormal activity.
Timer in the case will reset the trap.

Electronic clock. Especially designed for special ulouse of the Russian Army. Shockproof. Waterproof. Maintain dive to 300 meters. Equipped with a timer and a stopwatch. Batch of new watches have been repeatedly stolen military stalker Scout warehouse Special Forces Colonel Bibika (Base D-3) and wholesale traders the Zone. For these crimes Scout was offerd to death three times, but thanks to the notorious syndrome 'Fear of Death', a stalker managed to survive the enforcement of offers

The system of determining the geographic coordinates, directions and true solar time. For accurate compass work to the horizontal position of the device, which is achieved by coincidence cross compass. Activating the device is in a pistol slot. 
 Composition devaysa: 
 1. Magnetic compass 
 2. Laser Rangefinder 
 3. GPS receiver 
 4. Watch

I'm sorry brother, I can not bury you. That's my fault. You did not have to leave. I just wanted to confuse the hiring of Scar. I do not remember anything, but listening to your record, it has become clear. I am here for the second time. burner disabled, and opened the way to the north. How to complete all cases, be sure to bury your brother.

%c[255,1,255,1] K-t 
 %c[default] How long do you plan to solve the problem by upgrading Chernobyl, and can it produce increased amounts of MW without causing much damage to the environment? 
 %c[255,1,255,1] Prof. Goryunov 
 %c[default] We must do it in a short time. The era of perestroika and should be done according to established deadlines. The fact that nuclear power is capable of delivering more than ten times - it's obvious. Reliability of power and specials. protection at the highest level. 
 %c[255,1,255,1] K-t 
 %c[default] I am aware that the administration of Chernobyl does not approve such upgrades in a short time. What do you say to that? 
 %c[255,1,255,1] Prof. Goryunov 
 %c[default] In higher education authorities, and basically a lot of practice, but in practice one does not build a civilization, and the administration, not the head of our party, so that Nothing on the site should not stand. Forward! 
 %c[255,1,255,1] K-t 
 %c[default] But there is also a doer, the person in charge? 
 %c[255,1,255,1] Prof. Goryunov 
 %c[default] from the responsibility of my friend, no one has left. Even we are. That is, write in the article too much and just answer the fullest extent of the law. Too many questions to ask. 
 %c[255,1,255,1] K-t 
 %c[default] or how to export radioactive waste laid railway track along the Pripyat River, which is longer than the order of 100 km? Why not lead the way directly? 
 %c[255,1,255,1] Prof. Goryunov 
 %c[default] You have to understand that the railway easier to build on a flat surface, rather than to equate the rocky highlands. Next, set up tunnels to transport hazardous cargo on a special landfill, where the goods are to be disposed of malware using artificial anomalous zones. 
 %c[ 255,1,255,1] K-t 
 %c[default] All right. And a couple of questions - Do not you think that your artificial anomalous zones will not cope with the rapid replenishment of radioactive waste? How do you take care of the locals? There is some evidence of different types of mutations of the guesswork radioactive background. You do not think about the consequences? 
 %c[255,1,255,1] Prof. Goryunov 
 %c[default] NPP is both civilian and military purposes. Here, everything is left to chance. About the party took care of the local population. And as for the nonsense mutation and all, you'd better not watch American horror films on video cassettes that are like a plague fell upon our great country. All I need to work. See you there! 
 %c[255,1,255,1] K-t 
 %c[default] I would like to believe you as a young experienced. Thank you highlighted a couple of minutes. See you there!

I am very glad that you found this cache, which means that you can easily get to the Agricultural Industry Underground to find my hiding place of the deceased group 'Arrow', as well as valuable information. With the help of this device and the coordinates - teleport into the underground. Yes, do not hurry away from the tower, check the roof. If you want to go into the underground which has good supplies, then you can take a chance to jump from this tower to the railway metal works over the tracks. A kit, which you will find there, you can fix your guns. See the box on the metal works? Supplies, unless of course you are to weak to jump., Good luck to you wanderer. 
 This is the teleport coordinates: 
 Longitude 24° 14' 30" .17 
 Latitude 51° 30' 55" .94 
 Altitude 187m

For me hunting a mercenary with a scar on his face is fun. Crafty, very dangerous, must be careful. No campfires/barbecues might be seen. The probability that he died in that release when he shot at me is very small. No one has seen him though, but something tells me that he is still alive. Will I survive, that's the question? But why am I writing this? Maybe the mercenary finds this note? Yes, perhaps I need to leave it. Will he survive me or not, I do not care anymore. My friends were killed. Only the Doctor is left, but I feel ashamed to look him in the eye, as my friends I did not save. I go to the big stone and make a wish.
Important manuscripts of the Doctor about exploring and taming mutants that where created by the Zone.

About this stash only Swamp Doctor knows, but if you do not, the doctor can see you much confidence. The next stash need to find the same without a Positioner, but only prompt it to Pripyat in one of two grocery stores. In the stash will also be a note. I went to the North. Friends will not say anything, because my enemy with a scar on his face eludes me, and I do not want to implicate his friends.
Technical reference for research, at the end of all the records - two obscure clues. 1. Lake, Nevsky, dog - a knight. 2. Field, Relight, Sword.
The accident, the power unit. This is a hint for the code of one door. You need to get to Laboratory X-8. A little ammo won't hurt. See any mutants? No?! So far everything is going according to plan.

Mutants, mutants and more mutants. I think you can handle them. Use the GPS-Positioner to find a second teleport which will bypass the first to get into Lab x-8. 
 Here are the teleport coordinates: 
 Longitude 0° 00' 13" .35 
 Latitude -0° 00' 01" .64 
 Altitiude 44m

Again, these creatures are tenacious! Are you a brainwashed Controller? What a shame! There is a way out! Then use the Positioner. You need to find a second document which will provide an opportunity to remove the first stage of irradiation, and will transport to the subway. 
 This is the teleport coordinates: 
 Longitude 0° 00' 12".90 
 Latitude -0° 00' 07" .60 
 Altitude of 45m
Are you still alive? Thank God! Your skills must be awesome! See the transition in the subway, what is waiting for you who knows. I only know that there is a way out to Eastern Pripyat. Good luck!

Well, coming to an end of Freeplay! You are indisputably a 'Die Hard'! What remains only to find the passage to the Bar. 
 Here are the coordinates: 
 Longitude 24° 06' 54" .20 
 Latitude 51° 29' 52" .52 
 Altitude 155m
Case with swag belonging to Oleg Tango's group

Scientists are not directly interested in the hand itself, but the tendons and synovial channels. For unknown reasons the fluid which it contains has properties far exceeding the properties of all the known anticancer. The molecular structure of it is no different from the usual, but suffering the effects of a specific exposure, the properties have changed. Attempts to create an analogue in the laboratory have failed. The vast amount of goods to go abroad due to the devastation and poverty of both Ukrainian and Russian science and medicine.

Rare mutant. Many people have heard about it, but very few have seen it. Contact with such a creature as the rule is, ends in death. It is extremely tenacious. The origin almost nothing is known. Rumor has it that this is one of the subtypes of the mutated reasons unknown fracture or break a product of genetic mutations and chimeras. Represents a huge beast with a very strong blow hypertrophied upper extremities. Able to walk upright, but better is moved by all the limbs. Given the opportunity to say a few words chlenorazbornye, along with an animal roar, and the mode of transportation support the hypothesis of the origin of the fracture. Dangerous. Upon detection is highly recommended to keep a respectful distance.

Mutated Chernobyl cockroach. In view of which there are two, it normal apartment cockroach that exposed areas increased significantly in size and can reach up to 3 kg weight. Able to move quickly. Omnivorous, smelly and angry: for humans and mutants attack, usually in packs. Single individuals are usually not dangerous, but the cause of the rookies gag reflex. Deals pretty deep paresis on exposed body, but can bite and fabric. Salivary gland are poisonous, their secret stinks. The belly of cockroaches used for the preparation of the perimeter of scarce ointments, but unofficial sources in the beauty business.

Have all the movements and instincts of ordinary zombies, the cause of which is known. In the case of female individuals raises a number of questions and controversy - in fact women, even old age - an extreme rarity for the Zone ... From a distance, look like a typical granny Doctor.ssed appropriately, are able to evoke sympathy remarks inexperienced stalkers, then attack discouraged rookies, causing serious damage to the nails ...

A rare type of zombie. Argue that this type occurs with repeated contact with the zombies in the usual anomaly 'Star', then clothing and ammunition are completely dissolved and the flesh becomes almost invisible. The bones acquired increased density. Because of this zombie looks like a living slelet.

Jerboa has highly developed intellect, and scientists are trying to figure out how to fit in the tiny brain of a large amount of information, and other things. Of their brain scientists, but they are taken out of their zone, and stalkers who knows what they are doing.

The controller has psi abilities. From a distance, he can only intimidate, and create a variety of hallucinations, but when you approach closer, it deals damage. Scientists believe that their strength lies in his hand, but before the end of the hand controller is not understood.
No one knows why they they are valuable, but they are well paid for it.
Hand of Pseudogiant has properties that scientists have not told, but they are good for her to pay.

Resistance of the Pellicle, mutated cats to a chemical and electrical effects have long attracted the attention of scientists. Because of the lack of fat tails koshak most suitable for laboratory studies.
In chimera claw stronger than any metal, so they are very interesting to scientists.

Nice, when he was, Lucky Strike cigarettes of American Tobacco Company, popavschie the Zone by adapting suspicious individuals from the People's thistle. There are, basically, for beginners, recently caught inside the perimeter. We experienced stalkers no authority, as zamaterev, they quickly weaned from the habit to run fast from bloodsuckers, wild boars and other living creatures mutated.

The guide was accompanied by three scientists to explore an old abandoned territory that you can get to through a cave. I went with them as a security guard. Before entering the cave we caught up with bandits. Their leader I found out right away was Borov. They promised that they will not touch us if we show them the hostile territory where fenced in radioactive hills are. We agreed. We had a map of the Explorer and after we went out to move to the area Hog took the map and said one word 'ACE' and ordered his guys to kill us. I was able to shoot my way out, but I was injured. I only had one first aid kit, so I was bleeding a little. Somehow I found a way to Agricultural Industry. I went to the military. They helped my stop the bleeding.
Need to talk to Klenov, a former member of 'C-Consiousness'. Is there some truth to my dreams?
